item.description: ## Release Notes 1.26 * Update dependencies * Bump to net8 which should grant some performance improvements (win7 might not work going forward) * Remove ripple animation from Material themes (per #484) * Irony is now single instance app * Disable OSX update installation (online check only now) * Added new diff viewer * Stellaris 3.11 beta compatibility * Added conflict solver option to skip parsing some languages

## Release Notes 1.26 * Update dependencies * Bump to net8 which should grant some performance improvements (win7 might not work going forward) * Remove ripple animation from Material themes (per #484) * Irony is now single instance app * Disable OSX update installation (online check only now) * Added new diff viewer * Stellaris 3.11 beta compatibility * Added conflict solver option to skip parsing some languages
